name: CHIN 181 D100
prerequisites: CHIN 180, CHIN 100 or equivalent. Corequisite: This course may be taken concurrently with CHIN 180.

name: CHIN 290 B100
prerequisites: CHIN 191 or equivalent. This course is for students of Chinese origin who have near native speaking ability in Chinese (Mandarin or other dialects), but basic knowledge of written Chinese.
